description:
Not a Snap to find a working timer that isn't crippled by Snap.

Trying to find a coutndown timer using the Discover store and none of them work. Then I noticed that they are all "snaps" and I think the reason they are not working is because the audio files I want them to use are not in the snap-centric path or the app I try to execute (for those that do that) are not accessible due to snap.

I think the lowest possible rating should go to the whole Snap distribution model. I'm heading back to Synaptic.
For any tea drinker the venerable KTeaTime is a must have! Reliable and easy to use, simply perfect!
I'm using it a different way. I'm setting blocks of 1 hour for different tasks I have to do & then I can make a tea!

As other user commented I don't use for making Tea. The program is great for setting time blocks for different tasks. For example I usually use some custom blocks like PLANNING, WORK, ONLINE, REST, etc. I love that when the time is done it can be logged into a file.

Only issue is that it does not work well in the GNOME desktop.
summary: I love it, but it takes for ever to start in GNOME

description: I AM A BRI'ISH DEVELOPER WHO LIKES T AND 'HIS APP SAVED MY LOIFE
summary: OI MATE WHOT A GREAT APP

description: If you are a proper brit you'll usually work with a cup of nice tea at your desk anyway. This handy little fella of a program makes part of your daily routine a bit more streamlined.
My tea tastes like trash after using this app. It also alerts me every 5 minutes so i get scared that my computer is going to off. NO WHERE IS SAFE

Works as stated. It's easy to configure and reminds me to Not let my tea go bitter. 
Just wish there was a "Temperature" field to accompany the Seep Time...
Setting a teapot on simmer for a while with the alarm of doom.flac is an opportunity not missed with this eyebrow raising program. *sips tea*
Bin enttäuscht, daß diese Anwendung für mich nicht nutzbar ist

Ich habe dieses kleine Programm schon seit vielen Jahren auf meinem Compi und Laptop. Seitdem ist mein Tee nicht mehr bitter, weil ich ihn nicht vergesse. Da man auch eigene Zeiten eingeben kann, habe ich auch 60 Min für Kuchen oder 30 Min. für andere Backofenteile oder -gerichte hinzugefügt. Somit hole ich keine Kohle mehr aus dem Backofen.
summary: Ploppt auf, wenn die Ziehzeit um ist

description:
Tut genau das, was ich möchte. Nicht mehr, nicht weniger. Perfekt!
Installiert unter OpenSUSE Leap.
Es muy útil por si se te olvida beberte el té. Si eres unn poco estúpido esta es tu app!!
Es genial si tomas te y programas
